[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement ias_1_role-310000_reported_5 includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:RentalIncomeFromInvestmentPropertyNetOfDirectOperatingExpense of 3,369 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 4,483,795. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of 0. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:RentalIncomeFromInvestmentPropertyNetOfDirectOperatingExpense that should add to 3,369 are comprised of the following:
+ PropertyServiceChargeIncomeExpense 22,421 + RentalIncome 4,461,374
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for ias_1_role-310000_reported_5. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.

[DQR.IFRS.0127.9596] The statement ias_1_role-210000_reported_4 includes the concept ifrs-full:Equity in the presentation tree. The filing does not include a dimensional structure for this statement. The filing does not include a default value for this presentation item ifrs-full:Equity but does include dimensionalized values for this element of the following:
5, 24, 8,746
If the dimensionalized value appears in the financial statements, then a dimension needs to be added to the report. If the item has no value on the financial statements, then the presentation item should be removed from the financial statements.
